patthana16.18:4.1: Kusalaṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.18:4.2: Kusalaṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.18:4.3: Kusalaṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.18:4.4: Kusalaṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca naabyākato nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.18:4.5: Kusalaṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto ca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.18:5.1: Akusalaṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.18:6.1: Abyākataṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.18:6.2: Abyākataṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.18:6.3: Abyākataṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto ca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.18:7.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.18:8.1: Cittavippayutte tīṇi, hetuyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
